accepted: List of accepted terms and policies.
pending: List of pending terms and policies.

error.exist: A term-policy with this specification already exists.
error.notAccepted: You need to accept {property} policy before you can use this feature.
error.inactive: The policy is not active, most likely there's a newer version available
error.newerVersionExist: Newer version of the terms exists.
error.updateForbiddenStatusPublished: You can't update a published policy, you need to create a new version.
